name: process_constructions_insulated_roof

arguments.name: selectedliving
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the living space

arguments.name: selectedfrroof
arguments.display_name: Finished roof insulationFor manually entering finished roof insulation properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedfrroofr
arguments.display_name: Installed finished roof cavity insulation R-value

arguments.name: selectedrigidins
arguments.display_name: Rigid insulation of roof cavityFor manually entering rigid insulation properties of roof cavity, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedrigidinsthickness
arguments.display_name: Rigid insulation thickness of roof cavity

arguments.name: userdefinedrigidinsr
arguments.display_name: Rigid insulation R-value of roof cavity

arguments.name: selectedgypsum
arguments.display_name: Interior finish  of cavityFor manually entering interior finish properties of cavity, leave blank

arguments.name: selectedroofmat
arguments.display_name: Roofing material for finished roofFor manually entering roofing material properties of finished roof, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedroofmatthermalabs
arguments.display_name: Roofing material emissivity of finished roof

arguments.name: userdefinedroofmatabs
arguments.display_name: Roofing material absorptance of finished roof

modeler_description: Calculates material layer properties of finished constructions for the roof of the living space. Finds surfaces adjacent to the living space and sets applicable constructions.
description: This measure creates finished constructions for the roof of the living space.
